clean.name: Hope's Last Breath
clean.description: Heal a model within 1 inch of the reader for D6 HP. Does not work on Downed or Dead models.

clean.name: Will of the Optimistic
clean.description: Target model adds an extra D6 to the next test they make.

clean.name: Not Dead Yet
clean.description: A Dead model is awakened with 1 HP and gains an additional Flaw.

clean.name: Second Wind
clean.description: Target gains D6 temporary HP until the end of the Scenario. Reduce the reader's maximum HP by 2 each time they cast Hope's Last Breath. Cannot target Downed, Dead, or the reader.

clean.name: Visions of Tomorrow
clean.description: Target model must flee following the Morale rules.

clean.name: Shield of the Faithless
clean.description: Model cannot be targeted by ranged attacks for one round.

clean.name: False Dawn
clean.description: Target model produces light as if they carried a lantern for five rounds.

clean.name: Mind Blast
clean.description: Target model must pass a Presence test or becomes Dazed for one round.

clean.name: Golden Flare
clean.description: Target model must pass a Presence test or becomes Blinded for one round.

clean.name: Obey
clean.description: Target obeys one command, taking a single action or move it can perform. On failure the reader performs the command under the opponent's control.

clean.name: Unbreakable
clean.description: Target cannot fail Morale tests for the rest of the Scenario.

clean.name: Inmortalium Inventioni
clean.description: One model of your choice cannot be killed this Scenario. They can still be Downed. On a Fumble the reader is marked for death and automatically dies if Downed.

clean.name: Sanctify
clean.description: Monsters ignore the target for the rest of the Scenario unless the target attacks them. On a Fumble the Laughing Man appears and targets the reader.

clean.name: Bow of Skadi
clean.description: Target increases the range of all ranged attacks by 3 inches for this Scenario.

clean.name: Danse Macabre
clean.description: Target must make a Presence test or loses movement for the rest of the Scenario while dancing in place. Fumbles make the reader dance instead. Dancing models can spend an action to attempt a Presence test to stop.

clean.name: Visions of the Future
clean.description: Target can reroll one test this Scenario.

unclean.name: Flaming Hands of St Vilmarex
unclean.description: Reader hurls a ball of fire at a visible enemy, dealing D6 damage [Cruel].

unclean.name: Mindless Eyes
unclean.description: Target model becomes deranged and must pass a Presence test or attack the nearest model.

unclean.name: Invisible Hands
unclean.description: Move a dropped Weapon or Treasure up to D12 inches.

unclean.name: Ungrounded
unclean.description: Target hovers for one round, ignoring terrain and moving at twice normal speed.

unclean.name: Breath of the Undying
unclean.description: Target begins to suffocate and takes D4 damage when activated. They must pass a Presence test as an action to remove the effect.

unclean.name: One-Eyed King
unclean.description: Target becomes invisible and cannot be targeted by attacks, spells, or Monsters until they make any test.

unclean.name: Bones, Them Damn Bones
unclean.description: Summon a Skeleton at a target point. It attacks the nearest model but never the reader. On a failed cast it still appears and hunts the reader. If the reader dies the Skeleton leaves the board.

unclean.name: Eternal Sleep
unclean.description: Target must pass a Presence test or fall asleep. Sleeping models cannot activate until woken by damage or an ally's action.

unclean.name: Ride the Lightning
unclean.description: Strike a target within 12 inches for D6 damage that ignores Armor.

unclean.name: Lost at Sea
unclean.description: Target must pass a DR4 Presence test or be removed from play and make a Death Save. On a failed cast the reader takes the test instead. Cast once per Scenario.

unclean.name: Doom
unclean.description: All models within 12 inches, including allies and the reader, must pass a Presence test or take D10 damage ignoring Armor. Any failed cast counts as a Fumble.

unclean.name: Boil the Blood
unclean.description: Target makes a Toughness test. On failure their blood boils, dealing D8 damage that ignores Armor.

unclean.name: Vocare Cattus
unclean.description: Summon the Cath Palug. This is not recommended.

unclean.name: Miasma
unclean.description: Target becomes Diseased and is surrounded by a 1 inch gas cloud on all sides.

unclean.name: Soul Bind
unclean.description: Bind the soul of a model killed this Scenario to the reader. Bound souls can be sold after the battle for Gold equal to the model's HP.

unclean.name: Chaos
unclean.description: Roll to determine a random Unclean Scroll and immediately attempt to cast it. Choose targets after determining the Scroll.
